          <title>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This schematic illustration suggests the path of a free electron when a current, E, is flowing.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese schematische Abbildung schlägt den Pfad

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration schématique suggère la voie
